SmartFieldSpec.Name: EOM Report Child Status Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Used to display the Child's status to be used in EOM reports
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_SPONSORSHIPOPPOTUNITYCHILD_EOMREPORTCHILDSTATUS ( @ASOF datetime ) as begin
declare @projectStatusDesc_Active as nvarchar(100) = 'Active' declare @projectStatusDesc_ActiveReserved as nvarchar(100) = 'Active - Reserved' declare @projectStatusDesc_Pending as nvarchar(100) = 'Pending' declare @projectStatusDesc_PhasingOut as nvarchar(100) = 'Phasing Out' declare @projectStatusDesc_Closed as nvarchar(100) = 'Closed'
declare @projectStatusID_Active as uniqueidentifier = null declare @projectStatusID_ActiveReserved as uniqueidentifier = null declare @projectStatusID_Pending as uniqueidentifier = null declare @projectStatusID_PhasingOut as uniqueidentifier = null declare @projectStatusID_Closed as uniqueidentifier = null
declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_ChildAge as nvarchar(100) = 'Child is 16.5 years or older' declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_FieldMemoRequestingInfo as nvarchar(100) = 'Field memo - requesting information' declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_ProjectPending as nvarchar(100) = 'Project on pending status' declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_ProjectPhasingOut as nvarchar(100) = 'Project on phasing out status' declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_ProgramCompletion as nvarchar(100) = 'Completing program in 12 months' declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_NewChildVerification as nvarchar(100) = 'Need information verified - new child' declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_DepartureInProcess as nvarchar(100) = 'Departure in process' declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_BangladeshContactable as nvarchar(100) = 'Bangladesh contactable child' declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_TerminateHold as nvarchar(100) = 'Terminate hold'
declare @sponsorshipReasonID_ChildAge uniqueidentifier = null declare @sponsorshipReasonID_FieldMemoRequestingInfo as uniqueidentifier = null declare @sponsorshipReasonID_ProjectPending as uniqueidentifier = null declare @sponsorshipReasonID_ProjectPhasingOut as uniqueidentifier = null declare @sponsorshipReasonID_ProgramCompletion as uniqueidentifier = null declare @sponsorshipReasonID_NewChildVerification as uniqueidentifier = null declare @sponsorshipReasonID_DepartureInProcess as uniqueidentifier = null declare @sponsorshipReasonID_BangladeshContactable as uniqueidentifier = null declare @sponsorshipReasonID_TerminateHold as uniqueidentifier = null
declare @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility tinyint = 0 -- Child Mark Pending Eligibiltiy sponsorship reason enum
declare @eligibilityCode_Pending tinyint = 0 declare @eligibilityCode_Eligible tinyint = 1 declare @eligibilityCode_Ineligible tinyint = 2
declare @availabilityCode_Available tinyint = 0
declare @errorMessage nvarchar(max)
begin try select @sponsorshipReasonID_ChildAge = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where REASON = @sponsorshipReasonDesc_ChildAge and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility if @sponsorshipReasonID_ChildAge is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "' + @sponsorshipReasonDesc_ChildAge + '" Sponsorship Reason' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end
select @sponsorshipReasonID_FieldMemoRequestingInfo = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where REASON = @sponsorshipReasonDesc_FieldMemoRequestingInfo and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility if @sponsorshipReasonID_FieldMemoRequestingInfo is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "' + @sponsorshipReasonDesc_FieldMemoRequestingInfo + '" Sponsorship Reason' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end
select @sponsorshipReasonID_ProjectPending = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where REASON = @sponsorshipReasonDesc_ProjectPending and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility if @sponsorshipReasonID_ProjectPending is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "' + @sponsorshipReasonDesc_ProjectPending + '" Sponsorship Reason' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end
select @sponsorshipReasonID_ProjectPhasingOut = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where REASON = @sponsorshipReasonDesc_ProjectPhasingOut and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility if @sponsorshipReasonID_ProjectPhasingOut is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "' + @sponsorshipReasonDesc_ProjectPhasingOut + '" Sponsorship Reason' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end
select @sponsorshipReasonID_ProgramCompletion = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where REASON = @sponsorshipReasonDesc_ProgramCompletion and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility if @sponsorshipReasonID_ProgramCompletion is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "' + @sponsorshipReasonDesc_ProgramCompletion + '" Sponsorship Reason' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end
select @sponsorshipReasonID_NewChildVerification = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where REASON = @sponsorshipReasonDesc_NewChildVerification and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility if @sponsorshipReasonID_NewChildVerification is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "' + @sponsorshipReasonDesc_NewChildVerification + '" Sponsorship Reason' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end
select @sponsorshipReasonID_DepartureInProcess = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where REASON = @sponsorshipReasonDesc_DepartureInProcess and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility if @sponsorshipReasonID_DepartureInProcess is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "' + @sponsorshipReasonDesc_DepartureInProcess + '" Sponsorship Reason' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end
select @sponsorshipReasonID_BangladeshContactable = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where REASON = @sponsorshipReasonDesc_BangladeshContactable and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility if @sponsorshipReasonID_BangladeshContactable is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "' + @sponsorshipReasonDesc_BangladeshContactable + '" Sponsorship Reason' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end
select @sponsorshipReasonID_TerminateHold = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where REASON = @sponsorshipReasonDesc_TerminateHold and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility if @sponsorshipReasonID_TerminateHold is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "' + @sponsorshipReasonDesc_TerminateHold + '" Sponsorship Reason' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end
select @projectStatusID_Active = ID from USR_CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODE where DESCRIPTION = @projectStatusDesc_Active if @projectStatusID_Active is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "'+ @projectStatusDesc_Active + '" Project Status ' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end
select @projectStatusID_ActiveReserved = ID from USR_CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODE where DESCRIPTION = @projectStatusDesc_ActiveReserved if @projectStatusID_ActiveReserved is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "'+ @projectStatusDesc_ActiveReserved + '" Project Status ' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end
select @projectStatusID_Pending = ID from USR_CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODE where DESCRIPTION = @projectStatusDesc_Pending if @projectStatusID_Pending is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "'+ @projectStatusDesc_Pending + '" Project Status ' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end
select @projectStatusID_PhasingOut = ID from USR_CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODE where lower (DESCRIPTION) = @projectStatusDesc_PhasingOut if @projectStatusID_PhasingOut is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "'+ @projectStatusDesc_PhasingOut + '" Project Status ' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end
select @projectStatusID_Closed = ID from USR_CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODE where lower (DESCRIPTION) = @projectStatusDesc_Closed if @projectStatusID_Closed is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "'+ @projectStatusDesc_Closed + '" Project Status ' raiserror(@errorMessage,16,1); end end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR -- return 1 end catch;
select distinct
so.ID,
case -- Only create a value for children that are Eligible or Pending when so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Ineligible then ''
when so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Pending and ch_ext.FUNDED = 0 and so_reasonDeparture.ID is not null then 'Departure Pending'
when so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Pending and ch_ext.FUNDED = 0 and so_reasonFieldMemo.ID is not null then 'Field Memo Delinquency'
when so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Pending and ch_ext.FUNDED = 0 and so_reasonHoldingNew.ID is not null then 'Holding New'
when chpr_ext.CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODEID = @projectStatusID_PhasingOut and so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Pending and ch_ext.FUNDED = 1 and so_reasonProjectPhasingOut.ID is not null then 'Phasing Out'
when so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Pending and ch_ext.FUNDED = 1 and so_reasonProjectPending.ID is not null then 'Pending'
when so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Pending and ch_ext.FUNDED = 1 and so_reasonBDContactable.ID is not null then 'BD Contactable'
when so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Pending and ch_ext.FUNDED = 1 and so_reasonProgramCompletion.ID is not null then 'Program Completion'
when so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Pending and ch_ext.FUNDED = 1 and so_reasonChildAge.ID is not null then 'Teen16'
when so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Pending and ch_ext.FUNDED = 1 and so_reasonFieldMemo.ID is not null then 'Holding'
when so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Pending and ch_ext.FUNDED = 1 and so_reasonBDContactable.ID is not null then 'BD Contactable'
when so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Pending and ch_ext.FUNDED = 1 and so_reasonTerminateHold.ID is not null then 'Terminate hold'
when chpr_ext.CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODEID = @projectStatusID_Active and so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Eligible and ch_ext.FUNDED = 1 then 'Active - Ready'
when chpr_ext.CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODEID = @projectStatusID_Active and so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Pending and ch_ext.FUNDED = 1 then 'Active - Not Ready'
when chpr_ext.CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODEID = @projectStatusID_ActiveReserved and so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Eligible and ch_ext.FUNDED = 1 then 'Reserved - Ready'
when chpr_ext.CHILDPROJECTSTATUSCODEID = @projectStatusID_ActiveReserved and so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Pending and ch_ext.FUNDED = 1 then 'Reserved - Not Ready'
else ''
end as Status
from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION ch_ext on so.ID = ch_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION sl on sl.ID = so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID inner join dbo.USR_CHILDPROJECTEXTENSION chpr_ext on chpr_ext.ID = sl.FIELDOFFICEID left outer join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reasonDeparture on so_reasonDeparture.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and so_reasonDeparture.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @sponsorshipReasonID_DepartureInProcess left outer join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reasonFieldMemo on so_reasonFieldMemo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and so_reasonFieldMemo.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @sponsorshipReasonID_FieldMemoRequestingInfo left outer join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reasonChildAge on so_reasonChildAge.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and so_reasonChildAge.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @sponsorshipReasonID_ChildAge left outer join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reasonHoldingNew on so_reasonHoldingNew.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and so_reasonHoldingNew.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @sponsorshipReasonID_NewChildVerification left outer join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reasonProjectPending on so_reasonProjectPending.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and so_reasonProjectPending.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @sponsorshipReasonID_ProjectPending left outer join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reasonProjectPhasingOut on so_reasonProjectPhasingOut.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and so_reasonProjectPhasingOut.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @sponsorshipReasonID_ProjectPhasingOut left outer join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reasonProgramCompletion on so_reasonProgramCompletion.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and so_reasonProgramCompletion.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @sponsorshipReasonID_ProgramCompletion left outer join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reasonBDContactable on so_reasonBDContactable.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and so_reasonBDContactable.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @sponsorshipReasonID_BangladeshContactable left outer join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reasonTerminateHold on so_reasonTerminateHold.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and so_reasonTerminateHold.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @sponsorshipReasonID_TerminateHold return 0 end
